content: --अपेक्ष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} not depending on, irrespective or independent of, having no need of (with <ab>loc.</ab>); न्यायनिर्णीतसारत्वान्निरपेक्षमिवागमे <ls>Ki. 11. 39.</ls> {2} disregarding, taking no notice of. {3} free from desire, secure; <ls>H. 1. 83.</ls> {4} careless, negligent, indifferent. {5} indifferent to worldly attachments or pursuits; <ls>Ms. 6. 41.</ls> {6} disinterested, not expecting any reward from another; <ls>Bv. 1. 5.</ls> {7} without purpose. (--क्षा indifference, disregard.
